author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Yy Announces Full Exercise Of Over-Allotment Option In Huya Inc.'S Initial Public Offering
text:
May 17 (Reuters) - YY Inc:
* YY ANNOUNCES FULL EXERCISE OF OVER-ALLOTMENT OPTION IN HUYA INC.â€™S INITIAL PUBLIC OFFERING
* YY INC - UNDERWRITERS OF IPO OF ADSS BY HUYA EXERCISED OVER-ALLOTMENT OPTION IN FULL TO PURCHASE ADDITIONAL 2.25 MILLION ADS FROM PRICE OF $12/ADS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
